title: Samsung Launches Slimmest Smartphone in Race Against Apple
excerpt: Samsung unveiled its Galaxy S25 Edge, the slimmest smartphone in its lineup, featuring advanced AI to outpace Apple in the premium market. Targeting young consumers, the S25 Edge will be available in over 30 countries starting in May.

title: Windows 11's Recall AI: Revolutionizing How We Search Our Digital Past
excerpt: Microsoft's Recall AI for Windows 11 Copilot+ PCs introduces a visual timeline to search your digital history, transforming how you find past content.
